title: JSON schema for the .NET global.json configuration file

sdk.description: Specifies information about the .NET SDK to select.

version.description: The version of the .NET SDK to use.

allowPrerelease.description: Indicates whether the SDK resolver should consider prerelease versions when selecting the SDK version to use.

rollForward.description: The roll-forward policy to use when selecting an SDK version, either as a fallback when a specific SDK version is missing or as a directive to use a later version.

msbuild-sdks.description: Lets you control the project SDK version in one place rather than in each individual project.

MSTest.Sdk.description: Specifies the version of the MSTest SDK to use for unit testing.
